requestAlgorithm.description:
Specifies what data fetch algorithm to use:
  getBulk - based on SNMP GetBulk request (faster)
  walk    - based on SNMP GetNext request (slower)

address.description: SNMP host address. may be null, meaning that device exporter IP address is going to be used.

Specifies what data fetch algorithm to use:
  getBulk - based on SNMP GetBulk request (faster)
  walk    - based on SNMP GetNext request (slower)

address.description: SNMP host address. may be null, meaning that device exporter IP address is going to be used.

additionalProperties.description:
The key is interface SNMP index (ifIndex from IF-MIB), type uint32

post.summary: Implements signing-on functionality and returns authentication cookie

200.description:
A cookie is returned (set) upon successiful login operation
that must be used for authentication of all API calls

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Define to select only top entries.

parameters.name: start-time
parameters.description: Date and time start in the form (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

parameters.name: end-time
parameters.description: Date and time end in the form (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

value.description:
It can get one of the following forms:
  x:  - meaning that we want to search records that have at least one community starting with x
   :y - meaning that we want to search records that have at least one community ending with y
  x:y - meaning that we want to search records that have at least one community equal with x:y
where x, y  Uint16

parameters.name: table-columns
parameters.description: Table columns to be returned in table request

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: One of the columns to sort a report.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The sorting order of a report sorted by some column. Values can be either ascending or descending. Must by used with orderby parameter.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Define to select only top entries. Useful for graphs.

parameters.name: rate-unit
parameters.description: Rate unit used to convert aggregated unit data into a rate value

parameters.name: isolate-empty-spaces
parameters.description: Isolate empty data spaces with zeroes

parameters.name: start-time
parameters.description: Date and time start in the form (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

parameters.name: end-time
parameters.description: Date and time end in the form (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

value.description: ASN (32bit number), range in form ASN-ASN or group name
ASN (32bit number), range in form ASN-ASN or group name

anyOf.description: BGP multi-exit discriminator (MULTI_EXIT_DISC, MED) well-known attribute

value.description:
It can get one of the following forms:
  0:x:y - where x is 2-byte ASN and y is 4-byte value
  1:x:y - where x is 4-byte IPv4 and y is 2-byte value
  2:x:Y - where x is 4-byte ASN and y where 2-byte value

It can get one of the following forms:
  x:  - meaning that we want to search records that have at least one community starting with x
   :y - meaning that we want to search records that have at least one community ending with y
  x:y - meaning that we want to search records that have at least one community equal with x:y
where x, y  Uint16
Both IPv4 and IPv6

parameters.name: table-columns
parameters.description: Table columns to be returned in table request

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: One of the columns to sort a report.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The sorting order of a report sorted by some column. Values can be either ascending or descending. Must by used with orderby parameter.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Define to select only top entries. Useful for graphs.

parameters.name: filters-narrow-by
parameters.description: Narrow filters by location, device, interface

parameters.name: rate-unit
parameters.description: Rate unit used to convert aggregated column data into a rate value

parameters.name: isolate-empty-spaces
parameters.description: Isolate empty data spaces with zeroes

parameters.name: group-by-src-prefix
parameters.description: Group by source prefix from flows

parameters.name: group-by-src-prefix-length
parameters.description: Group by specific source prefix length

parameters.name: group-by-dst-prefix
parameters.description: Group by destination prefix from flows

parameters.name: group-by-dst-prefix-length
parameters.description: Group by specific destination prefix length

parameters.name: as-path-prepend-remove
parameters.description: Whether remove or not consecutive duplicate ASNs

parameters.name: dictionary
parameters.description: Add dictionary for some supported elements

parameters.name: table-min-max
parameters.description: When grouping also calculate maximum and minimum columns

post.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

password.description:
Password complexity requirements:
  1. Passwords cant contain the user name.
  2. Length between 8 and 64 characters
  3. At least one uppercase letter
  4. At least one lowercase letter
  5. At least one number
  6. No whitespaces/non-visible special characters
